page.title: 11BRILL SURGERY;AREA HOSPITALS
page.content: Four doctors work in Brill:J.Spence,S. T.Whittington.They are for about 3,000 people in Brill and 6 local villages. Brill surgery is open on Weds,Thurs and Fri mornings and on Tues from 4.30 to 6pm.A health visitor visits families and old people at home.The surgery arranges ante and post natal visits for young mothers.There is a monthly baby clinic.W.R.V.S.provides"meals on wheels" for old people in their homes. Dr.Spence sends patients to these hospitals:John Radcliffe,Oxford;Stoke Mandeville,Aylesbury;Thame Cottage.He works for 35 hrs a week in the surgery, 1 night a week and 1 weekend a month. Children and old people have medicines free.Adults over 16 pay 2 pounds.Common illnesses for children are ear infections and infectious diseases.For adults they are bronch- itis,backache,indigestion and viruses.
